body.value:
{
 "dataFactoryName":"DataFactory Name: @{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
 "pipelineName":"Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().parameters.PipelineName}",
 "messageHeader":"@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName} : Move/Copy Failed",
 "messageBody1":"Market Information",
 "messageBody2":"",
 "messageBody3":"We are not able to load your file. Something is wrong during move from Market Data fileshare or Copy to Scrubbed Container",
 "messageBody4":"",
 "messageBody5":"Fix data and submit your file again.",
 "emailAddress":"@{pipeline().parameters.emailAddress}"
}

{
 "dataFactoryName":"DataFactory Name: @{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
 "pipelineName":"Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().parameters.PipelineName}",
 "messageHeader":"@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName} : Confirmed For Processing",
 "messageBody1":"",
 "messageBody2":"",
 "messageBody3":"Thank You. We will inform you after the file has been processed.",
 "messageBody4":"",
 "messageBody5":"",
 "emailAddress":"@{pipeline().parameters.emailAddress}"
}

{
 "dataFactoryName":"DataFactory Name: @{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
 "pipelineName":"Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().parameters.PipelineName}",
 "messageHeader":"@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName} : Load Failed",
 "messageBody1":"Market Information",
 "messageBody2":"",
 "messageBody3":"We are not able to load your file. Something is wrong",
 "messageBody4":"",
 "messageBody5":"Fix data and submit your file again.",
 "emailAddress":"@{pipeline().parameters.emailAddress}"
}

{
 "dataFactoryName":"DataFactory Name: @{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
 "pipelineName":"Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().parameters.PipelineName}",
 "messageHeader":"@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName} : Loaded With Error",
 "messageBody1":"Market Information",
 "messageBody2":"",
 "messageBody3":"Please see error in error table : @{pipeline().parameters.ErrorTableName}",
 "messageBody4":"",
 "messageBody5":"Error count : @{activity('GetErrorCount').output.firstRow.ERROR_COUNT}",
 "emailAddress":"@{pipeline().parameters.emailAddress}"
}

{
 "dataFactoryName":"DataFactory Name: @{pipeline().parameters.DataFactoryName}",
 "pipelineName":"Pipeline Name: @{pipeline().parameters.PipelineName}",
 "messageHeader":"@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName} : Loaded Successfully",
 "messageBody1":"Market Information",
 "messageBody2":"",
 "messageBody3":"",
 "messageBody4":"",
 "messageBody5":"Error count : @{activity('GetErrorCount').output.firstRow.ERROR_COUNT}",
 "emailAddress":"@{pipeline().parameters.emailAddress}"
}

properties.description: It describes the folder in the data source store.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		{Deliver Point Code} as string,
		{Delivery Point} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Delivery_Point_ID as integer,
		Deliver_Point_Code as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Delivery_Point_Desc as string,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp,
		Update_DateTime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Source_File as string,
		Batch_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Delivery_Point_ID]\n      ,[Deliver_Point_Code]\n      ,[Delivery_Point]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Desc]\n      ,[Delivery_Point_Long_Desc]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n      ,[Update_DateTime]\n      ,[Process_Name]\n      ,[Source_File]\n      ,[Batch_ID]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Delivery_Point]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDimDeliveryPointLkp
RelationalDimDeliveryPointLkp select(mapColumn(
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp = Delivery_Point_ID,
		Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp = Deliver_Point_Code,
		Delivery_Point_Lkp = Delivery_Point,
		Delivery_Point_Desc_Lkp = Delivery_Point_Desc,
		Delivery_Point_Long_Desc_Lkp = Delivery_Point_Long_Desc,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime_Lkp = Update_DateTime,
		Process_Name_Lkp = Process_Name,
		Source_File_Lkp = Source_File,
		Batch_ID_Lkp = Batch_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDeliveryPointLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
CheckInputRecord@Valid, SelectDimDeliveryPointLkp lookup({Deliver Point Code} == Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')),
		Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Batch_ID = Batch_ID) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull({Deliver Point Code})) && not(isNull({Delivery Point})),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Type/Basis/Price_Point"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull({Deliver Point Code})) || not(isNull({Delivery Point}))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp) || notEquals({Deliver Point Code}, Deliver_Point_Code_Lkp) || notEquals({Delivery Point}, Delivery_Point_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Deliver_Point_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deliver_Point_Code = {Deliver Point Code},
		Delivery_Point = {Delivery Point},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Deliver_Point_Code = {Deliver Point Code},
		Delivery_Point = {Delivery Point},
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		Price_Point as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		Type_ID as integer,
		Type as string,
		Basis as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp,
		Update_DateTime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Source_File as string,
		Batch_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Type_ID]\n      ,[Type]\n      ,[Basis]\n      ,[Price_Point]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n      ,[Update_DateTime]\n      ,[Process_Name]\n      ,[Source_File]\n      ,[Batch_ID]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_Type]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDimTypeLkp
RelationalDimTypeLkp select(mapColumn(
		Type_ID_Lkp = Type_ID,
		Type_Lkp = Type,
		Basis_Lkp = Basis,
		Price_Point_Lkp = Price_Point,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime_Lkp = Update_DateTime,
		Process_Name_Lkp = Process_Name,
		Source_File_Lkp = Source_File,
		Batch_ID_Lkp = Batch_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimTypeLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
CheckInputRecord@Valid, SelectDimTypeLkp lookup(Type == Type_Lkp
	&& Basis == Basis_Lkp
	&& Price_Point == Price_Point_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(Type_Lkp) && isNull(Basis_Lkp) && isNull(Price_Point_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(Type_Lkp) && isNull(Basis_Lkp) && isNull(Price_Point_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(Type_Lkp) && isNull(Basis_Lkp) && isNull(Price_Point_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')),
		Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Batch_ID = Batch_ID) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull(Type)) && not(isNull(Basis)) && not(isNull(Price_Point)),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("Type/Basis/Price_Point cannot be empty"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull(Type)) || not(isNull(Basis)) || not(isNull(Price_Point))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(Type_Lkp) && isNull(Basis_Lkp) && isNull(Price_Point_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Type','Basis','Price_Point'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Type,
		Basis,
		Price_Point,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Type,
		Basis,
		Price_Point,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
